issue.title: [Dev][Archery] "archery docker run" sets env var to None when inherited
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18157](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18157). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When an environment variable is marked inherited in `docker-compose.yml` and it's not set in the calling environment, Archery sets it to "None" in the container.
